thread.title: Nick Xenophon wants politicans to stop double-dipping
thread.title_full: Nick Xenophon wants politicans to stop double-dipping

title: Nick Xenophon wants politicans to stop double-dipping
text:
Nick Xenophon wants politicans to sto... Nick Xenophon wants politicans to stop double-dipping Next Story Prev Story 1 hr ago Read more: The Age 
Independent senator Nick Xenophon wants the rules governing politicians' entitlements tightened to prevent former MPs who take up diplomatic postings from being able to simultaneously access their parliamentary superannuation. Senator Xenophon said on Sunday that former treasurer Joe Hockey should not claim his parliamentary pension if he is appointed Australia's ambassador to Washington D.C., a move that is widely expected.   The Age.
